titles.title: To require certain welfare programs to deny benefits to persons who fail a drug test, and for other purposes.
To require certain welfare programs to deny benefits to persons who fail a drug test, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committees on Agriculture, and Financial Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
